frontmatter.title: Kiwi Road Tripper
frontmatter.description: Kiwi Road Tripper is an application to help tourists or just local people of New Zealand to figure out and plan their route through our huge databases full of unique locations to visit. With a simple flowing design to help keep the complication of the app to as minimal as possible. Using React, Redux, mySQL Databases and with keeping the team of 6 in an agile process to have constant checks with our product owners.

frontmatter.title: Johannes Gutenberg: The Birth of Movable Type
frontmatter.description: German inventor Johannes Gutenberg developed a method of movable type and used it to create one of the western world’s first major printed books, the “Forty–Two–Line” Bible.
